verses.verse: וּבְנֵ֨י <S%H1121><s%> Now the sons רְאוּבֵ֥ן <S%H7205><s%> of Reuben בְּכֽוֹר־ <S%H1060><s%> the firstborn יִשְׂרָאֵל֮ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> he הַבְּכוֹר֒ <S%H1060><s%> (for he [was] the firstborn וּֽבְחַלְּלוֹ֙ <S%H2490><s%> but forasmuch as he defiled יְצוּעֵ֣י <S%H3326><s%> bed אָבִ֔יו <S%H1><s%> his father's נִתְּנָה֙ <S%H5414><s%> was given בְּכֹ֣רָת֔וֹ <S%H1062><s%> his birthright לִבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> unto the sons יוֹסֵ֖ף <S%H3130><s%> of Joseph בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> is not לְהִתְיַחֵ֖שׂ <S%H3187><s%> and the genealogy is not to be reckoned לַבְּכֹרָֽה׃ <S%H1062><s%> after the birthright

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> Though יְהוּדָה֙ <S%H3063><s%> For Judah גָּבַ֣ר <S%H1396><s%> prevailed בְּאֶחָ֔יו <S%H251><s%> above his brethren וּלְנָגִ֖יד <S%H5057><s%> and of him [came] the chief ruler מִמֶּ֑נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> yet וְהַבְּכֹרָ֖ה <S%H1062><s%> but the birthright לְיוֹסֵֽף׃ <S%H3130><s%> Joseph ס

בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> The sons רְאוּבֵ֖ן <S%H7205><s%> [I say] of Reuben בְּכ֣וֹר <S%H1060><s%> the firstborn יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel חֲנ֥וֹךְ <S%H2585><s%> [were] Hanoch וּפַלּ֖וּא <S%H6396><s%> and Pallu חֶצְר֥וֹן <S%H2696><s%> Hezron וְכַרְמִֽי׃ <S%H3756><s%> and Carmi

בְּנֵ֖י <S%H1121><s%> The sons יוֹאֵ֑ל <S%H3100><s%> of Joel שְׁמַֽעְיָ֥ה <S%H8098><s%> Shemaiah בְנ֛וֹ <S%H1121><s%> his son גּ֥וֹג <S%H1463><s%> Gog בְּנ֖וֹ <S%H1121><s%> his son שִׁמְעִ֥י <S%H8096><s%> Shimei בְנֽוֹ׃ <S%H1121><s%> his son
מִיכָ֥ה <S%H4318><s%> Micah בְנ֛וֹ <S%H1121><s%> his son רְאָיָ֥ה <S%H7211><s%> Reaia בְנ֖וֹ <S%H1121><s%> his son בַּ֥עַל <S%H1168><s%> Baal בְּנֽוֹ׃ <S%H1121><s%> his son

בְּאֵרָ֣ה <S%H880><s%> Beerah בְנ֔וֹ <S%H1121><s%> his son אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> whom הֶגְלָ֔ה <S%H1540><s%> carried away תִּלְּגַ֥ת פִּלְנְאֶ֖סֶר <S%H8407><s%> whom Tilgathpilneser מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king אַשֻּׁ֑ר <S%H804><s%> of Assyria ה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> he נָשִׂ֖יא <S%H5387><s%> [captive] he [was] prince לָרֽאוּבֵנִֽי׃ <S%H7206><s%> of the Reubenites

וְאֶחָיו֙ <S%H251><s%> And his brethren לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָ֔יו <S%H4940><s%> by their families בְּהִתְיַחֵ֖שׂ <S%H3187><s%> was reckoned לְתֹלְדוֹתָ֑ם <S%H8435><s%> of their generations הָרֹ֥אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> [were] the chief יְעִיאֵ֖ל <S%H3273><s%> Jeiel וּזְכַרְיָֽהוּ׃ <S%H2148><s%> and Zechariah

וּבֶ֙לַע֙ <S%H1106><s%> And Bela בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son עָזָ֔ז <S%H5811><s%> of Azaz בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son שֶׁ֖מַע <S%H8087><s%> of Shema בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יוֹאֵ֑ל <S%H3100><s%> of Joel ה֚וּא <S%H1931><s%> who יוֹשֵׁ֣ב <S%H3427><s%> who dwelt בַּעֲרֹעֵ֔ר <S%H6177><s%> in Aroer וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> even נְב֖וֹ <S%H5015><s%> even unto Nebo וּבַ֥עַל מְעֽוֹן׃ <S%H1186><s%> and Baalmeon

וְלַמִּזְרָ֗ח <S%H4217><s%> And eastward יָשַׁב֙ <S%H3427><s%> he inhabited עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> far לְב֣וֹא <S%H935><s%> unto the entering מִדְבָּ֔רָה <S%H4057><s%> in of the wilderness לְמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַנָּהָ֖ר <S%H5104><s%> from the river פְּרָ֑ת <S%H6578><s%> Euphrates כִּ֧י <S%H3588><s%> because מִקְנֵיהֶ֛ם <S%H4735><s%> because their cattle רָב֖וּ <S%H7235><s%> were multiplied בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land גִּלְעָֽד׃ <S%H1568><s%> of Gilead

וּבִימֵ֣י <S%H3117><s%> And in the days שָׁא֗וּל <S%H7586><s%> of Saul עָשׂ֤וּ <S%H6213><s%> they made מִלְחָמָה֙ <S%H4421><s%> war עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with הַֽהַגְרִאִ֔ים <S%H1905><s%> with the Hagarites וַֽיִּפְּל֖וּ <S%H5307><s%> who fell בְּיָדָ֑ם <S%H3027><s%> by their hand וַיֵּשְׁבוּ֙ <S%H3427><s%> and they dwelt בְּאָ֣הֳלֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H168><s%> in their tents עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> throughout כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all פְּנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> throughout מִזְרָ֥ח <S%H4217><s%> all the east לַגִּלְעָֽד׃ <S%H1568><s%> [land] of Gilead פ

וּבְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> And the children גָ֣ד <S%H1410><s%> of Gad לְנֶגְדָּ֗ם <S%H5048><s%> opposite יָֽשְׁב֛וּ <S%H3427><s%> dwelt בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> over against them in the land הַבָּשָׁ֖ן <S%H1316><s%> of Bashan עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> far סַלְכָֽה׃ <S%H5548><s%> unto Salchah

יוֹאֵ֣ל <S%H3100><s%> Joel הָרֹ֔אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> the chief וְשָׁפָ֖ם <S%H8223><s%> and Shapham הַמִּשְׁנֶ֑ה <S%H4932><s%> the next וְיַעְנַ֥י <S%H3285><s%> and Jaanai וְשָׁפָ֖ט <S%H8202><s%> and Shaphat בַּבָּשָֽׁן׃ <S%H1316><s%> in Bashan

וַאֲחֵיהֶ֞ם <S%H251><s%> And their brethren לְבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> of the house אֲבוֹתֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H1><s%> of their fathers מִֽיכָאֵ֡ל <S%H4317><s%> [were] Michael וּמְשֻׁלָּ֡ם <S%H4918><s%> and Meshullam וְ֠שֶׁבַע <S%H7652><s%> and Sheba וְיוֹרַ֧י <S%H3140><s%> and Jorai וְיַעְכָּ֛ן <S%H3275><s%> and Jachan וְזִ֥יעַ <S%H2127><s%> and Zia וָעֵ֖בֶר <S%H5677><s%> and Heber שִׁבְעָֽה׃ <S%H7651><s%> seven ס

אֵ֣לֶּה ׀ <S%H428><s%> These בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> These [are] the children אֲבִיחַ֗יִל <S%H32><s%> of Abihail בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son חוּרִ֡י <S%H2359><s%> of Huri בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יָ֠רוֹחַ <S%H3386><s%> of Jaroah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son גִּלְעָ֧ד <S%H1568><s%> of Gilead בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son מִיכָאֵ֛ל <S%H4317><s%> of Michael בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יְשִׁישַׁ֥י <S%H3454><s%> of Jeshishai בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יַחְדּ֖וֹ <S%H3163><s%> of Jahdo בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son בּֽוּז׃ <S%H938><s%> of Buz

אֲחִי֙ <S%H277><s%> Ahi בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son עַבְדִּיאֵ֣ל <S%H5661><s%> of Abdiel בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son גּוּנִ֔י <S%H1476><s%> of Guni רֹ֖אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> chief לְבֵ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> of the house אֲבוֹתָֽם׃ <S%H1><s%> of their fathers

וַיֵּֽשְׁב֛וּ <S%H3427><s%> And they dwelt בַּגִּלְעָ֥ד <S%H1568><s%> in Gilead בַּבָּשָׁ֖ן <S%H1316><s%> in Bashan וּבִבְנֹתֶ֑יהָ <S%H1323><s%> and in her towns וּבְכָֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מִגְרְשֵׁ֥י <S%H4054><s%> and in all the suburbs שָׁר֖וֹן <S%H8289><s%> of Sharon עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> far תּוֹצְאוֹתָֽם׃ <S%H8444><s%> upon their borders

כֻּלָּם֙ <S%H3605><s%> All הִתְיַחְשׂ֔וּ <S%H3187><s%> All these were reckoned by genealogies בִּימֵ֖י <S%H3117><s%> in the days יוֹתָ֣ם <S%H3147><s%> of Jotham מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וּבִימֵ֖י <S%H3117><s%> and in the days יָרָבְעָ֥ם <S%H3379><s%> of Jeroboam מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel פ

בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> The sons רְאוּבֵ֨ן <S%H7205><s%> of Reuben וְגָדִ֜י <S%H1425><s%> and the Gadites וַחֲצִ֥י <S%H2677><s%> and half שֵֽׁבֶט־ <S%H7626><s%> the tribe מְנַשֶּׁה֮ <S%H4519><s%> of Manasseh מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> afflicted חַיִל֒ <S%H2428><s%> of valiant men אֲ֠נָשִׁים <S%H582><s%> men נֹשְׂאֵ֨י <S%H5375><s%> able to bear מָגֵ֤ן <S%H4043><s%> buckler וְחֶ֙רֶב֙ <S%H2719><s%> and sword וְדֹ֣רְכֵי <S%H1869><s%> and to shoot קֶ֔שֶׁת <S%H7198><s%> with bow וּלְמוּדֵ֖י <S%H3925><s%> and skilful מִלְחָמָ֑ה <S%H4421><s%> in war אַרְבָּעִ֨ים <S%H705><s%> and forty וְאַרְבָּעָ֥ה <S%H702><s%> [were] four אֶ֛לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand וּשְׁבַע־ <S%H7651><s%> seven מֵא֥וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred וְשִׁשִּׁ֖ים <S%H8346><s%> and threescore יֹצְאֵ֥י <S%H3318><s%> that went out צָבָֽא׃ <S%H6635><s%> to the war

וַיַּעֲשׂ֥וּ <S%H6213><s%> And they made מִלְחָמָ֖ה <S%H4421><s%> war עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> against הַֽהַגְרִיאִ֑ים <S%H1905><s%> with the Hagarites וִיט֥וּר <S%H3195><s%> with Jetur וְנָפִ֖ישׁ <S%H5305><s%> and Nephish וְנוֹדָֽב׃ <S%H5114><s%> and Nodab

וַיֵּעָזְר֣וּ <S%H5826><s%> And they were helped עֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H5921><s%> against וַיִּנָּתְנ֤וּ <S%H5414><s%> were delivered בְיָדָם֙ <S%H3027><s%> into their hand הַֽהַגְרִיאִ֔ים <S%H1905><s%> against them and the Hagarites וְכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> and all שֶׁ֣עִמָּהֶ֑ם <S%H5973><s%> with כִּ֠י <S%H3588><s%> because לֵאלֹהִ֤ים <S%H430><s%> to God זָעֲקוּ֙ <S%H2199><s%> and all that [were] with them for they cried בַּמִּלְחָמָ֔ה <S%H4421><s%> in the battle וְנַעְתּ֥וֹר <S%H6279><s%> and he was intreated לָהֶ֖ם כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> because בָ֥טְחוּ <S%H982><s%> of them because they put their trust בֽוֹ׃

וַיִּשְׁבּ֣וּ <S%H7617><s%> And they took away מִקְנֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H4735><s%> their cattle גְּֽמַלֵּיהֶ֞ם <S%H1581><s%> of their camels חֲמִשִּׁ֥ים <S%H2572><s%> fifty אֶ֙לֶף֙ <S%H505><s%> thousand וְצֹ֗אן <S%H6629><s%> and of sheep מָאתַ֤יִם <S%H3967><s%> two hundred וַחֲמִשִּׁים֙ <S%H2572><s%> and fifty אֶ֔לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand וַחֲמוֹרִ֖ים <S%H2543><s%> and of asses אַלְפָּ֑יִם <S%H505><s%> two thousand וְנֶ֥פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> any אָדָ֖ם <S%H120><s%> man מֵ֥אָה <S%H3967><s%> an hundred אָֽלֶף׃ <S%H505><s%> thousand

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> because חֲלָלִ֤ים <S%H2491><s%> slain רַבִּים֙ <S%H7227><s%> down many נָפָ֔לוּ <S%H5307><s%> For there fell כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> because מֵהָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> [was] of God הַמִּלְחָמָ֑ה <S%H4421><s%> because the war וַיֵּשְׁב֥וּ <S%H3427><s%> And they dwelt תַחְתֵּיהֶ֖ם <S%H8478><s%> their place עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until הַגֹּלָֽה׃ <S%H1473><s%> in their steads until the captivity פ

וּבְנֵ֗י <S%H1121><s%> And the children חֲצִי֙ <S%H2677><s%> of the half שֵׁ֣בֶט <S%H7626><s%> tribe מְנַשֶּׁ֔ה <S%H4519><s%> of Manasseh יָשְׁב֖וּ <S%H3427><s%> dwelt בָּאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land מִבָּשָׁ֞ן <S%H1316><s%> from Bashan עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against בַּ֧עַל חֶרְמ֛וֹן <S%H1179><s%> unto Baalhermon וּשְׂנִ֥יר <S%H8149><s%> and Senir וְהַר־ <S%H2022><s%> and unto mount חֶרְמ֖וֹן <S%H2768><s%> Hermon הֵ֥מָּה <S%H1992><s%> they רָבֽוּ׃ <S%H7235><s%> they increased
